answer:
The inactivated influenza (flu) vaccine (flu shot) can be given at the same time or any time before or after the 12 month vaccines. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## The inactivated influenza (flu) vaccine (flu shot) can be given at the same time or any time before or after the 12 month vaccines.

Immunization Nurse
question: My son has his one year immunization on nov 7. I would like to get him the flu shot as well. Should we wait a certain number of days between getting his immunization and the shot
question_variation_0: immunizations how long should i wait
question_variation_1: when do i need to wait until immunization
question_variation_2: immunization for flu shot how long before immunizing baby
